text: Is anyone else having issues with custom modules and the content between the checkbox field? I have a custom module where I have a form selection for the user to show on the page if they check off the "Enable" boolean I created. The issue is all the code between the {% if %} statement to show when true is showing on initial load of the page.
The main issue with this is I added it to our blog template and then all our older posts showed a dummy form (even though the default value was unchecked for the boolean)
If there are any HS devs that can help, that would be appreciated, I tried the forums and have had a support ticket open for like 2 days with no response.
Can you show me some screen shots of what you are doing?
it looks like others are having issues in the GDD Slack channel with custom modules also
basically everything was showing even though the checkbox was set tofalse

<@U2H3TT8F2> just change your first line to read
{% if widget.enable_cta_flyout == "true‚Äù %}
^^ Sorry, I got on a call and got lost in what I was doing.
There was an issue with checkboxes in custom modules that should have been fixed early this afternoon
